title: Strategies for Building Online Learning Systems and Strengthening Social Capital

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Operations Experience and Adaptability to Digital Environments
context.additional_context: The need to establish an effective online learning system in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more strategies for building social capital to transition to online learning
Learners can propose structural/cognitive social capital enhancement plans for organizations after case analysis
Learners can develop practical solutions for operating online learning in technology-constrained environments (smartphone-centric)
Learners can establish organizational response systems that ensure learning continuity in crisis situations (uncertainty)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
